description: Needs a way to Full-screen . I would give it 5 star *****, if I could get the screen bigger. I tried alt+enter and that didn't work.
summary: Love the game. The controls are very responsive. Speed is awesome

description: No option to turn off sound that I noticed. Would be much better if the sound settings could be tuned.
summary: Ridiculously loud.. turn off your sound

description:
This is just a plain old tetris clone with a poorly design UI, controls are not customizable in the GUI
It also lacks modern rules like hold piece, and SRS.
summary: Design flaws and no guidelines rules

description: Графика осталась на уровне 1990 года. То есть никакая. Зачем нужна такая игра в 2021?
